title: Ample Parking, New Vinyl Windows, Plank-Wood Flooring
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom Units: $300 Security Deposit with Approved Credit 2 Bedroom Units: $400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Welcome to Vega Apartments', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 88', 'OR Text', '88', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 690 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Offering a variety of cozy apartments in Northglenn, CO, Vega is the perfect place to call home.', 'Our one- and two-bedroom Northglenn apartments feature comfortable floor plans that are complemented by our celebrated amenities package.', 'Our residents are able to enjoy in-unit air-conditioning, cable and Wi-Fi ready outlets, elegant ceiling fans, and ample closet space, while the community-at-large features a heated swimming pool, community grill area, on-site laundry facilities, and individual private entries.', 'Vega is nestled in the heart of Northglenn, just a short drive north from all the action Denver has to offer.', 'However, residents do not have to travel far to enjoy popular dining and entertainment options.', "Enjoy local flavors like Bad Daddy's Burger Bar and Saigon Basil, while nearby thrills like Boondocks Recreation and The North Side Tavern are always a good choice for fun close to home.", "Vega is close to the area's shopping centers and small businesses and offers convenient nearby access to major bus lines that each of our residents can easily use to commute to and from our wonderful community.", 'Give us a call today to schedule your private tour of Vega Apartments.', 'Features:', 'Air Conditioning, Cable Ready & Wired for High-Speed Internet, Oversized Closet Spaces, New Vinyl Windows, Plank-Wood Flooring', 'Community Amenities:', 'Laundry Facilities On-Site, Elevator Access, Fantastic Location Just Minutes from Two Major Bus Lines, Ample Parking, Pet-Friendly Community with Two Dog Parks, Two Sparking Swimming Pools, Community BBQ Area with Gas Grills, Community Playground', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'k1c2aS0gUS']
